channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: This Is BBC TWO
channel.desc: A preview of upcoming programmes from BBC Two.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Beechgrove Garden
channel.desc: Brian is under planting the part of Beechgrove known as the Calendar Border, a plot that has been designed to have something of a horticultural interest at any time of the year.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Breakfast
channel.desc: The BBC's Breakfast programme features the latest news, sport, business, weather and other items on a daily basis.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Landward
channel.desc: Dougie reports on the Bluetongue virus and meets the Scottish scientists studying its spread. Meanwhile, Shahbaz meets Belgian vet students getting hands-on experience on Scottish farms.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: This Farming Life
channel.desc: Christmas is looming, but this is no holiday period for the farmers. In the east of Scotland east of Inverness, Martin's sheds are now full of cows and their newborn calves. Two calves in particular give Martin cause for concern.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Spartacus
channel.desc: Spartacus, who is living in brutal conditions and is forced to fight to his death for the pleasure of wealthy Romans, leads a heroic struggle for freedom. His army of gladiators is swelled by slaves who pillage estates and are trying to escape from Italy.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Flog It!
channel.desc: The team visit Herstmonceux Castle and antiques experts Jonathan Pratt and James Lewis find treasures to take to auction, including some beautiful bronze sculptures. Also, Paul Martin takes a trip on a very large miniature railway.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Race Across the World
channel.desc: With over two thirds of the race completed, and almost 10,000km travelled, four teams have successfully made it to the fifth checkpoint, McLeod Ganj.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Scandinavia with Simon Reeve
channel.desc: The second leg of Simon's journey takes him from the stunning fjords of Norway to Iceland - the original land of fire and ice.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Amazing Hotels: Life Beyond the Lobby
channel.desc: At Phinda Private Game Reserve in South Africa, Monica Galetti and Rob Rinder join forces with the hotel staff to learn how to deliver a luxury safari experience. While Rob tracks cheetahs, Monica wields a machete with the habitat team.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Top Gear
channel.desc: Jeremy Clarkson, Richard Hammond and James May continue their epic African odyssey. Having survived insane traffic, lethal mudslides and some distinctly dubious map reading, the trio and their ailing estate cars reach the climax of their quest to find the definitive source of the Nile.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Scandinavia with Simon Reeve
channel.desc: On the last leg of his Scandinavian journey, Simon uncovers the surprising and sometimes shocking side of Sweden and Denmark, two of the happiest and wealthiest countries on earth.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Later ... with Jools Holland
channel.desc: With performances from Sheffield Britpop legends Pulp, Swedish rockers The Hives, American singer-songwriter Suzanne Vega, rising star Nectar Woode and London band Wunderhorse.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Radio 2 In Concert
channel.desc: Celebrating the best live music on Radio 2.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: One-Day International Cricket
channel.desc: Highlights from the second ODI between England and West Indies of 2025.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Run
channel.desc: In a small town in the north of Scotland, a group of young men escape their day-to-day realties and bond through a series of thrilling late-night car races.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Question Time
channel.desc: Fiona Bruce hosts an hour of topical debate, with a panel of politicians and other guests facing topical questions from an audience in different parts of the UK each week.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: The Bombing of Pan Am 103
channel.desc: The Frankfurt luggage list and bomb-damaged clothing leads Scottish CID to a small clothes shop on the island of Malta. Was this the origin of the bomb?

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: This Is BBC TWO
channel.desc: A preview of upcoming programmes from BBC Two.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Saturday Kitchen Best Bites
channel.desc: An array of tasty treats from Julius Roberts, Sabrina Ghayour, Sam and Shauna, and Andi Oliver. Meanwhile, Rick Stein and the Hairy Bikers head out and about across the UK.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Springwatch
channel.desc: As Springwatch embarks on their 20th year, it's set to be a sensational celebration, with two new locations, a new cast of wildlife characters and nests that have never been featured before.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: BBC News
channel.desc: A comprehensive compilation of the latest and the most important news stories, updates and developments from the UK and different parts of the world.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Politics Live
channel.desc: Jo Coburn invites a panel of guests to share their opinions on the newsmaking stories of the day.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: The Edge
channel.desc: The game show that mixes general knowledge quizzing and bowling.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Lightning
channel.desc: Comedian Zoe Lyons presents the electrifyingly fast quiz with a ?3,000 jackpot. Six plucky contestants compete across six rounds testing their general knowledge, quick thinking and speedy reactions whilst our ruthless spotlight patrols the studio.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Unbeatable
channel.desc: Today, John, Maria, Caroline and Mark battle it out to see which one of them is unbeatable.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Murder, Mystery and My Family
channel.desc: Top criminal barristers Sasha Wass QC and Jeremy Dein QC re-examine the case of an off-duty soldier who was convicted of murdering a family friend on New Year's Eve. Bishop Auckland, County Durham, 1934.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Flog It!
channel.desc: Antiques expert Elizabeth Talbot falls for a book of fairytales illustrated by Arthur Rackham, and Adam Partridge discovers an elegant chiming Swiss pocket watch. Paul Martin then meets one of the last remaining survivors of the Dunkirk evacuation during the Second World War.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Richard Osman's House of Games
channel.desc: Babatunde Al?sh?, Sophie Duker, Gaby Roslin and Jeff Stelling take on a series of quizzes selected by Richard Osman. A daily winner is declared following a quickfire round at the end of each show, and the scores are tallied across the week.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Clive Myrie's Italian Roadtrip
channel.desc: Staying in what was one of Naples' poorest neighbourhoods, in a hotel that's also an art gallery, Clive discovers how this always-colourful city is changing for the better. As a big fan of opera, Clive is also excited to join the cast of the Teatro San Carlo opera house in the run up to their opening night, and while in the costume department, he just can't resist trying a few things on.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Earth's Great Rivers
channel.desc: A look at the astonishing wildlife, landscapes and people of the Nile, the world's longest river. From elephants and leopards, to extreme kayakers and ancient wonders, its great length is a lifeline for astonishing wildlife and cultures.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Springwatch
channel.desc: Chris Packham and Michaela Strachan are getting to know the spring A-listers. They also report back on the wildlife antics that have been happening. Iolo Williams continues his Northern Ireland road trip by venturing out to Rathlin Island.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Jane Austen: Rise of a Genius
channel.desc: How a self-taught woman from a small English village became a great novelist.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Upstart Crow
channel.desc: Will Shakespeare takes it badly when told his new play about two sets of identical twins separated at birth and given the same names is rather far-fetched, until he decides to make it a musical. He needs help from Thomas Morley, a Tudor music legend.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Newsnight
channel.desc: Featuring extensive coverage of the day's top national and international news stories, along with explanations about the context and potential aftereffects.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: BBC Weather
channel.desc: The latest weather forecast.
